DataElement.preferredName: Biospecimen Events Domain Biospecimen Event Planned Time Point
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The planned time point when the biospecimen events to be done as defined in protocol.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Biospecimen Events Domain Biospecimen Event Planned Time Point Name
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: An events domain that documents biospecimen collection and storage information.:Any material sample taken from a biological entity for testing, diagnostic, propagation, treatment or research purposes, including a sample obtained from a living organism or taken from the biological object after halting of all its life functions. Biospecimen can contain one or more components including but not limited to cellular molecules, cells, tissues, organs, body fluids, embryos, and body excretory products._Something that happens at a given place and time._The literal identifier of a planned point in time.
